verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and Timotheus <S%G5095><s%> our brother, <S%G80><s%>

To the saints <S%G40><s%> and faithful <S%G4103><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> which are at <S%G1722><s%> Colosse: <S%G2857><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be to you, and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father <S%G3962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
We give thanks <S%G2168><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> and the Father <S%G3962><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for you,

Since we heard <S%G191><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and of the love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> you have to all <S%G3956><s%> the saints, <S%G40><s%>

For the hope <S%G1680><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is laid <S%G606><s%> up for you in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> whereof <S%G3739><s%> you heard <S%G4257><s%> before <S%G4257><s%> in the word <S%G3056><s%> of the truth <S%G226><s%> of the gospel; <S%G2098><s%>

Which <S%G3588><s%> is come <S%G3918><s%> to you, as it is in all <S%G3956><s%> the world; <S%G2889><s%> and brings <S%G2592><s%> forth <S%G1901><s%> fruit, <S%G2592><s%> as it does also <S%G2532><s%> in you, since <S%G575><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> you heard <S%G191><s%> of it, and knew <S%G1921><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in truth: <S%G226><s%>

As you also <S%G2532><s%> learned <S%G3129><s%> of Epaphras <S%G1889><s%> our dear <S%G27><s%> fellow servant, <S%G4889><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is for you a faithful <S%G4103><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%>
Who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> declared <S%G1213><s%> to us your <S%G5216><s%> love <S%G26><s%> in the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

For this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> we also, <S%G2532><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> we heard <S%G191><s%> it, do not cease <S%G3973><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%> for you, and to desire <S%G154><s%> that you might be filled <S%G4137><s%> with the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of his will <S%G2307><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and spiritual <S%G4152><s%> understanding; <S%G4907><s%>

That you might walk <S%G4043><s%> worthy <S%G516><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> pleasing, <S%G699><s%> being fruitful <S%G2592><s%> in every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> and increasing <S%G837><s%> in the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

Strengthened <S%G1412><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> might, <S%G1411><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his glorious <S%G1391><s%> power, <S%G2904><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> and long-suffering <S%G3115><s%> with joyfulness; <S%G5479><s%>

Giving thanks <S%G2168><s%> to the Father, <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> has made <S%G2427><s%> us meet <S%G2427><s%> to be partakers <S%G3310><s%> of the inheritance <S%G2819><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> in light: <S%G5457><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> has delivered <S%G4506><s%> us from the power <S%G1849><s%> of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> and has translated <S%G3179><s%> us into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of his dear <S%G26><s%> Son: <S%G5207><s%>
In whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> redemption <S%G629><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> his blood, <S%G129><s%> even the forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins: <S%G266><s%>
Who <S%G3739><s%> is the image <S%G1504><s%> of the invisible <S%G517><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> creature: <S%G2937><s%>

For by him were all <S%G3956><s%> things created, <S%G2936><s%> that are in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and that are in earth, <S%G1093><s%> visible <S%G3707><s%> and invisible, <S%G517><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> they be thrones, <S%G2362><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> dominions, <S%G2963><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> principalities, <S%G746><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> powers: <S%G1849><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things were created <S%G2936><s%> by him, and for him:
And he is before <S%G4253><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, and by him all <S%G3956><s%> things consist. <S%G4921><s%>

And he is the head <S%G2776><s%> of the body, <S%G4983><s%> the church: <S%G1577><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is the beginning, <S%G746><s%> the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> from the dead; <S%G3498><s%> that in all <S%G3956><s%> things he might have the preeminence. <S%G4409><s%>
For it pleased <S%G2106><s%> the Father that in him should all <S%G3956><s%> fullness <S%G4138><s%> dwell; <S%G2730><s%>

And, having made <S%G1517><s%> peace <S%G1517><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of his cross, <S%G4716><s%> by him to reconcile <S%G604><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things to himself; <S%G848><s%> by him, I say, whether <S%G1535><s%> they be things in earth, <S%G1093><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> things in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And you, that were sometime <S%G4218><s%> alienated <S%G526><s%> and enemies <S%G2190><s%> in your <S%G3588><s%> mind <S%G1271><s%> by wicked <S%G4190><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> has he reconciled <S%G604><s%>

In the body <S%G4983><s%> of his flesh <S%G4561><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> to present <S%G3936><s%> you holy <S%G40><s%> and blameless <S%G299><s%> and unreproveable <S%G410><s%> in his sight: <S%G2714><s%>

If <S%G1489><s%> you continue <S%G1961><s%> in the faith <S%G4102><s%> grounded <S%G2311><s%> and settled, <S%G1476><s%> and be not moved <S%G3334><s%> away <S%G3334><s%> from the hope <S%G1680><s%> of the gospel, <S%G2098><s%> which you have heard, <S%G191><s%> and which <S%G3739><s%> was preached <S%G2784><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%> which is under <S%G5259><s%> heaven; <S%G3772><s%> whereof <S%G3739><s%> I Paul <S%G3972><s%> am made <S%G1096><s%> a minister; <S%G1249><s%>

Who now <S%G3568><s%> rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in my sufferings <S%G3804><s%> for you, and fill <S%G466><s%> up that which is behind <S%G5303><s%> of the afflictions <S%G2347><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> in my flesh <S%G4561><s%> for his body's <S%G4983><s%> sake, which <S%G3739><s%> is the church: <S%G1577><s%>

Whereof <S%G3739><s%> I am made <S%G1096><s%> a minister, <S%G1249><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the dispensation <S%G3622><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> to me for you, to fulfill <S%G4137><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

Even the mystery <S%G3466><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> has been hid <S%G614><s%> from ages <S%G165><s%> and from generations, <S%G1074><s%> but now <S%G3570><s%> is made <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> to his saints: <S%G40><s%>

To whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> make <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the riches <S%G4149><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles; <S%G1484><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is Christ <S%G5547><s%> in you, the hope <S%G1680><s%> of glory: <S%G1391><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> we preach, <S%G2605><s%> warning <S%G3560><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> and teaching <S%G1321><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom; <S%G4678><s%> that we may present <S%G3936><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

Whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I also <S%G2532><s%> labor, <S%G2872><s%> striving <S%G75><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his working, <S%G1753><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> works <S%G1754><s%> in me mightily. <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1411><s%>
